description.paragraph1: Remote sensing technology in agriculture refers to the use of sensors (e.g. satellites) and imaging systems to collect and analyse data about crops, soil, and environmental conditions without direct physical contact.
description.paragraph2: By integrating satellite imagery, artificial intelligence (AI), and machine learning, Agreena is able to offer farmers an efficient way to monitor their farm from space.
description.paragraph3: Key Applications of our remote sensing technology include field boundary detection, cover crop detection, tillage detection as well as crop rotation detection to name a few.
description.paragraph4: Find out more about <technologyLink> Agreena's technology </technologyLink> on <websiteLink> Agreena.com. </websiteLink>

findOutMore.headline: What is remote sensing technology within agriculture?

getStarted.description: British farmers can earn up to <bold>{{amount}}/ha for positive environmental practices.</bold> See what you could earn.
getStarted.disclaimer: Projected values are estimates only and are not guaranteed. <button>Find out more</button>

section1.content: This is an early-stage tool designed to give you a quick, indicative estimate based on one crop and the practices detected on your selected fields. It combines satellite data with assumptions to show what you could earn through regenerative farming. Earnings estimates are indicative and are not guaranteed.
section1.heading: About the calculator

section2.content:
We estimate your environmental impact and earnings based on the follwing farming practices:

  • Tillage method
  • Cover crop usage
  • Fertiliser type
  • Crop residue mulching

These practices — along with your total field area — are used to calculate your field’s GHG emissions (CO₂) and Soil Organic Carbon (SOC). This gives us your net carbon effect, which we translate into potential earnings based on average market values.
section2.heading: Calculation data

steps.step4: We analyse your practices using satellite data

getStarted.terms: Projected values are estimates only and are not guaranteed. <link>Find out more</link>
getStarted.title: Calculate your farm's earnings potential
